ratings.notes: arm_idproposed_contextual_controlledTAB4TAB5TAB3TAB2TAB1Short noteThe rain has made our supplies scarce and I must be fair with my remaining healing potions. Let's find something you need in exchange!
arm_idbaseline_no_contextTAB2TAB3TAB4TAB5TAB3Short NoteI understand your hurry, but remember that honesty is the cornerstone of our trade here at Marketplace.

arm_idbaseline_no_context_phi3_latest<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>5<TAB>4<TAB>Short note: The response maintains the persona of a fair-minded merchant who values honesty and integrity, despite being pressed for time. It offers an alternative solution that respects both sides' needs without resorting to dishonest tactics.
